title: Adib Mazloom
text:
Welcome to my personal portfolio.
I am an Aerospace Engineer and MBA Candidate passionate about technical innovation, data-driven decision making, and strategic engineering solutions.

title: Engineering Analytics
text:
Welcome to the Engineering Analytics section of my portfolio.
This page showcases professional and academic projects that demonstrate my skills in thermal analysis, systems engineering, and mechanical design.



Wavious LLC â€“ San Diego, CA
June 2021 â€“ February 2022



Thermal Chiplet Test Bench



Developed thermal modeling solutions for military-grade chiplets, improving thermal performance by over 35Â°C.
Designed and implemented rigorous test protocols for extreme condition validation, increasing test efficiency by 40%.
Analyzed heat dissipation methods, leading to a 20% reduction in system cooling requirements.
Tools used: MATLAB, thermal test rigs, engineering test automation.





UCSD Aerospace Engineering Program Project



Mars Glider Design



Developed fixed-wing UAV systems for planetary exploration environments.
Improved CAD modeling accuracy by 25% for soft goods integration.
Conducted advanced structural simulations, leading to a 10% reduction in weight while preserving airframe performance.
Skills: SolidWorks, FEA, aerodynamic modeling.





UCSD Capstone Project



Venus Airship Design



Designed and built a complete Venus Airship, capable of withstanding the harsh Venus environment.
Utilized old technology from Venera missions as ideas for surviveability.
Focused on structural optimization, thermal safety, and real-world system integration.
Tools used: SolidWorks, MATLAB, Arduino, FEA software.






CAD Modeling (SolidWorks, AutoCAD)

FEA & Thermal Simulation (ANSYS, MATLAB)

Data Analysis (Python, R)

System Prototyping (Arduino, PCB design)

Aerospace Test Development

title: MBA Projects
text:
Welcome to the MBA Projects section of my portfolio.






Investment Portfolio Simulation



Developed a diversified investment portfolio using real-world market data.
Allocated assets across sectors including Technology, Healthcare, Energy, and Financials.
Achieved strong returns with an emphasis on risk management and sector balancing.
Included detailed monthly reports and performance tracking.
Tools used: Excel, RStudio, Power BI.








Supply Chain Optimization Project



Conducted detailed analysis of supply chain inefficiencies for manufacturing optimization.
Proposed strategic solutions for production and logistics improvements.
Built dynamic models using Solver and Excel-based optimization tools.
Visualized findings through Tableau dashboards to assist executive decision-making.
